data.displayName: TEP - ToU 22 Pre Smart Meter + $100 Welcome Credit

fees.description: A $13.00 fee applies for each bill that's paid after the due date. This fee is not subject to GST.

We accept Visa and Mastercard for payments via our secure Westpac payment portal at pay.energylocals.com.au. A credit card fee of 0.81% or a debit card processing fee of 0.46% will be applied when paying with these card types. Please note that processing fees for payments made via direct debit using a credit or debit card will be waived.
Direct debit dishonour payment fee. This fee is not subject to GST.

electricityContract.terms: Available to residential customers with a Tesla Powerwall 2 at their premises. Your solar PV system must not exceed 15kW for each Powerwall at the premises the system is installed. You agree to have a smart meter installed if one is not already operating at your premises. Welcome credit is available to offset electricity charges and may not be withdrawn or converted into cash. See�www.energylocals.com.au/tesla-energy-plan-tou-terms-Evo.

discounts.description: Receive $220 (incl GST) in Grid Support Credits each year for each Powerwall you have connected. The applicable portion of the $220 (incl GST) in Grid Support Credits will be calculated daily and appear as a credit on your bill each month.

When you connect to the Tesla Energy Plan with an existing Powerwall, you will receive a Welcome Credit of $100 (incl GST). The credit will be applied at month 3 after your transfer date. Welcome credit is available to offset charges and may not be withdrawn or converted into cash. Available to customers who currently own a Powerwall and transfer their electricity to the Tesla Energy Plan. See terms for details. Available to new customers only.

electricityContract.variation: This plan may be repriced up to once per calendar year

eligibility.description: Must have Tesla Powerwall 2 connected to internet via Wi-Fi or Ethernet and must not have network supply voltages that exceed normal inverter operating limits.

If you do not currently have a smart meter installed, Energy Locals will install one at your home at no cost to you (unless additional electrical works are required). Until your smart meter is installed, Single Rate pricing will apply. See terms for details.

solarFeedInTariff.description: Retailer Feed-in Tariff (inc. GST, if any)

electricityContract.additionalInformation: All normal fees are listed here however in some circumstances, your local distributor may charge fees for certain additional services such as a home move. See energylocals.com.au/fees
